keywords: ['electric guitar', 'no voices', 'tremolo bar', 'three chords', 'no other instruments', 'instrumental']
caption: This song features an electric guitar playing the main melody. The guitar plays three ascending chords. Each chord is strummed once at the beginning of the bar. The tremolo bar is used to give the sound a tremulous effect. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This is an instrumental song. This song can be played in a guitar instruction video.
